basicInfo.name: Rudy
basicInfo.flavor: As the Knight of Light and the long-standing protector of the Mystic Woods, Rudy is acknowledged as the High Guardian by the people.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 50% of Physical Attack plus 60% of Defense 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 65% of Physical Attack plus 75% of Defense.

Skill 1.name: Charge
Skill 1.desc:
1 Enemy (By Highest No. of Buffs)
 - 100% chance to inflict Buff Duration Reduction. [Reduced by: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Deals damage equal to 170% of Physical Attack plus 195% of Defense 1 time(s).
 - 85% chance to inflict Stun. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 205% of Physical Attack plus 235% of Defense.
 - Increases Chance: Stun chance becomes 100%.

Skill 2.name: Raise Shield
Skill 2.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Link. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants 1 Debuff Removal(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Adds Effect: Link reduction rate of 10%.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Increases Turns: Link duration becomes 3 turn(s).
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Adds Effect: Crowd Control Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

Passive.name: Steadfast Shield
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Defense Boost. [Always Active]
 - Self
 - Grants Damage Resistance. [Always Active]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Defense Boost to 24%.
 - Increases Effect: Damage Resistance to 20%.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

basicInfo.name: Rudy
basicInfo.flavor: Rudy's succession to Knight of Light has earned him the title of Guardian of Light from the heroes of the Mystic Woods.

Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 155% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 175% of Magic Attack.

Skill 2.name: Raise Shield
Skill 2.desc:
All Allies

Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Grants 1 Debuff Removal(s).

basicInfo.name: Rudy
basicInfo.flavor: Rudy and Kris were inseparable until the competition for the Knight of Light title destroyed their friendship. Rudy now guards Terra Kingdom from Kris.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 40% of Physical Attack plus 50% of Defense 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 40% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 50% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.name: Charge
Skill 1.desc:
1 Enemy (By Highest No. of Buffs)
 - 100% chance to inflict Buff Duration Reduction. [Reduced by: 1 Turn(s)]
 - Deals damage equal to 140% of Physical Attack plus 160% of Defense 1 time(s).
 - 70% chance to inflict Stun. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 140% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 160% of Magic Attack.

Skill 2.name: Raise Shield
Skill 2.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Link. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Grants 1 Debuff Removal(s).

Passive.name: Steadfast Shield
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Defense Boost. [Always Active]
 - Self
 - Grants Damage Resistance. [Always Active]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Defense Reduction to 11%.
